mapper.sql: id, order_no, ref_no, order_date, biz_type, cust_id, cust_no, cust_name, cust_buyer, cust_mail, org_name, org_part, org_sales_id, org_sales_name, contract_id, contract_no, account_type, state_flag, f_level, f_step, check_state_flag, flow_instance_id, f_multi_level0, f_date_time0, f_multi_level1, f_date_time1, biz_remark, remark, org_id, tenant_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, deleted_user_id, delete_user_name
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_order SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
